website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced driver that still has some nice adjustable features. Generates plenty of speed off the club face.
pros: Traditional driver design that's easy to use
Allows you to slightly adjust the loft of the club face, as well as the lie angle of the face, so you can conform the driver to fit your swing and game
Lightweight design helps you generate extra club head speed
cons: Older club, so it doesn't have all of the latest technologies

customer_reviews.title: this driver is FANTASTIC! I have been able to hit the ball ...
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not a "regular" golfer (i only get out a couple times a year), this driver is FANTASTIC! I have been able to hit the ball extremely straight and far enough (150-200+ yards) for my liking. With more practice, I know I'll increase distance over time. The driver is extremely light and has a great, quality grip. It also came with a beautiful, Callaway leather cover. I purchased this as a "like new" quality and it arrived better than expected: I could not tell of any scratches on the club before using it. A great buy for $89!
customer_reviews.author: Generic Amazon_buyer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful driver, and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful driver, and a great price. They weren't kidding - the wear and tear is absolutely minimal, nothing was warped, and my only complaints are that the labels are a bit difficult to take off. I'd recommend something with a weaker adhesive to the seller, but the product is great, hence the 5-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Driver
customer_reviews.text: Nice club! Replaced my Calaway Razr-X and seeing better distance and accuracy after two rounds. Outstanding condition for a used club (never used?).
customer_reviews.author: dkk

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice club and is the first adjustable club I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice club and is the first adjustable club I've owned. It has a draw bias adjustment but at the neutral setting it has a nice draw. If I put it on D for a draw bias it tends to pull hook for me. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Finally has good drivers/woods again!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome club! Way better than the last 3 nike drivers I had. Condition was way better than I expected for a used club, looks brand new! HIghly recommend buying from Callaway Golf Pre-owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade from my original Big Bertha. More distance, straighter and more consistent drives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent driver coming in almost new condition
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent driver coming in almost new condition. It was impossible to tell if the club was ever hit. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Desiderio

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: One of the better models holding its value till now. Older model but its technology still makes it one of the best. Actually a hidden gem for those in the know.
customer_reviews.author: dayunski

customer_reviews.title: super forgiving. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Went out yesterday for the first round of the season. Was a complete train wreck with every club in the bag except my new V series! Launched high and straight, super forgiving. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good balance and feel when hitting the ball. Making distance more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: readerdoc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! Quality club and looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for a first class driver!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this driver for months now. It is awesome. Increased my drive by 20-30 yards. Don't waste your money on a model that just came out when you can get a model a few years older like this one for about half the price. The head angle is adjustable to help compensate for a slice or hook. I set mine to "draw" until i worked out some mechanical issues, then moved it back over to standard and let 'em fly! Great driver
customer_reviews.author: Music Lady

customer_reviews.title: The club is great.. well balanced
customer_reviews.text: The club is great ..well balanced .. and well made. I purchased a used club and the price well I could not pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying My Callaway Driver
customer_reviews.text: The club came in perfect condition and his very easy to use. Already improved my game!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Henry

customer_reviews.title: It did very good a. I was a solid job for me
customer_reviews.text: It did very good a .I was a solid job for me.it hit further than my old briver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a brand new club that hit only a few balls. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Wyttenbach

customer_reviews.title: Farther - straighter.
customer_reviews.text: Like this one a lot ---- more distance. Easy to swing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Big Bertha - Great Driver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Driver is great!!!! Received from Puetz and they were fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vilano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking club getting about 10 yds more on drives.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal , it looks brand new but the hosel adjustment doesn't work, but it's ok for me because I'm not going to adjust anyway, it comes with head cover and tools ......
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty, sounds great and I picked up a few extra yards ...
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty, sounds great and I picked up a few extra yards but lost a little accuracy. Best part about this club was the price. $75 on Amazon. Yes Please!
customer_reviews.author: Amerz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked my old one better. Gave it to my grandson
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice club miss-hits fly much straighter than your standard driver.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not a good club.
customer_reviews.text: 1st this club did not come with a head cover or the adjustment tool that normally comes with a driver at a golf store. 2nd I believe this club is defective because it does not sound right when the ball hits the face and does not fly through the air like it should. Unfortunately I waited too long to be able to return it. Live and learn. I probably will not buy another club online.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Driver shaft is failure, do not buy directly from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: After approximately 4000 ball strikes (including 2000 practice balls and twenty 100-stroke games) the driver shaft sheared in half completely, approximately 12" above the hosel. I take great care of my sports equipment, so I was shocked this occurred. I purchase this from Amazon.com directly in September 2015, so apparently there is no recourse for a replacement from Amazon nor Callaway. While the driver served me well when I used it, I certainly cannot recommend this equipment, nor its purchase from Amazon.com directly. Go to your local golf equipment dealer where they will most certainly honor the replacement of such a simple but problematic club failure.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Falter

customer_reviews.title: love the drivers still learning how to hit with it ...
customer_reviews.text: love the drivers still learning how to hit with it but it's going to work out very well for me
customer_reviews.author: jim jones

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from a Callaway driver; very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I had two Callaway iron sets and two Callaway drivers in the past and loved them, but I could not hit this driver. At best I was at 170-180 yards when I normally is at 210-220 yards with my two year old Adams Speedline S. The sound of the ball off the face was a dead, muted sound, which I did not like. It also didn't feel like the ball was coming off the face hot, and the results confirmed that. Club appearance was spot on, but not the performance. I had to return this purchase; kudos for Amazon and its return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Whodis

customer_reviews.title: Great Price For This Driver
customer_reviews.text: increased swing speed-bought with lite flex--when hit correct ball takes off--very happy with club--could have save some money if bought few months later---get fitted, makes a difference --Hittem Staight
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Callaway Men's Big Bertha V Series Driver
product_meta.description:
There are many ways to find distance - one of them is speed. And speed (and lots of it) is exactly what we're bringing in the Big Bertha V Series Driver. It's the newest member of our Big Bertha Family, built for distance from lightweight materials, better aerodynamics and refined components, with a high MOI and OptiFit adjustability. We've said it and we'll say it again, it's here to give you more speed than you've ever had so you can get #Bertha Long.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
There are many ways to find distance - one of them is speed. And speed (and lots of it) is exactly what we're bringing in the Big Bertha V Series Driver. It's the newest member of our Big Bertha Family, built for distance from lightweight materials, better aerodynamics and refined components, with a high MOI and OptiFit adjustability. We've said it and we'll say it again, it's here to give you more speed than you've ever had so you can get #BerthaLong.
